{Visual Spigot}

A Minecraft Server Wrapper

VisualSpigot comes with a unique and beautifully designed interface for starting local Minecraft servers. You can have as many servers as you want and access each of them within the same window.

Made With

  • Html5
  • SCSS
  • Javascript
  • JQuery
Download Page
User _jcc_ states: "This is just what I needed! As a developer, trying to create plugins for multiple versions is EXTREMELY annoying due to the fact that you have to have many different servers and they're all spread around. This fixes EVERYTHING!!! The GUI is AWESOME, everything is simple and it supports many server versions!"
